data.title: Dan Cocea on LinkedIn: Check out this job at Sandoz Romania: Medical Representative
data.meta_description: Check out this job at Sandoz Romania: Medical Representative - OTC - Cluj/Sibiu/Hunedoara
data.text:
New consent forms introduced by ALIMS!!! The Agency for Medicines and Medical Devices of Serbia, Agencija za lekove i medicinska sredstva Srbije, known as ALIMS in the Republic of Serbia, has recently introduced new consent forms on its official website. These forms specifically pertain to the "applicant's agreement for electronic communications regarding drugs and medical devices." In the event of any recent modifications concerning the individuals using electronic communication applications, responsible personnel, or other details covered by these forms, it is now imperative to complete updated consent forms. However, if there have been no alterations to the user or any other pertinent information, there is no need to submit a fresh consent form. This represents a significant stride in enhancing the efficiency and transparency of the application procedure for permits related to pharmaceuticals and medical devices. Our partner, Marija Cvjetićanin is following the development. #cvjeticaninpartners

India's Surge in Janaushadhi Medical Stores. Key numbers: 🔷 Estimated 1 to 1.2 million people buy medicines daily from Janaushadhi Kendras across India. 🔷 During FY 2023, Pharmaceuticals and Medical Devices Bureau of India (PMBI) sold Janaushadhi medicines worth approximately ₹1,236 crore 🔷Sales volume led to savings of around ₹7,416 crore for Indian citizens. 🔷Prime Minister inaugurated the 10,000th Janaushadhi Kendra last year, plan to increase the number to 25,000 by FY26. 🔷 As of January 3, the number of Janaushadhi stores reached 10,373, offering over 1,965 drugs and 293 medical consumables and equipment #genericdrugs #indianpharma #genericmedicines

Attention Medical Industry Professionals in India! The Central Government has recently issued a new order that medical doctors can only prescribe generic drugs. Means; doctors cannot prescribe any brands; only the generic names. What does this mean for the industry? Many are wondering what will happen to the favors doctors used to receive from pharma companies? Additionally, what will happen to the medical representatives roles? Will they now become retail network managers? Will the pharma companies use mass media advertising to popularise their brands? It is important to keep abreast of the latest developments in the medical industry in India. Stay informed and stay ahead of the curve. #MedicalIndustryIndia #GenericDrugs #CentralGovernmentOrder https://lnkd.in/gNh-GSta

The Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) has been diligently developing its Unique Device Identification (UDI) system over the past few years, involving multiple rounds of public consultation and industry feedback. As the release of UDI regulations draws near, this article offers a comprehensive overview of the TGA UDI regulatory framework and the pivotal TGA UDI Hub. For more information, click here: https://bit.ly/3w0t2sx #UDI #Australia #Regulatory #TGA

The 2024 edition of Lexology Getting The Deal Through publication Pharma & Medical Device Regulation is live. BDK Advokati’s Head of Life Sciences Bisera Andrijasevic authored the chapter on Serbia, which provides a comprehensive overview of the legislative and regulatory landscape in Serbia, including insight into the regulatory framework related to obtaining and amending marketing authorisations, clinical practice, advertising and promotion, off-label use and unlicensed products, as well as issues related to sale and supply of medicines and medical devices in Serbia. #pharma #medicaldevice #regulation #serbia

Commencing on October 1, 2023, all foreign manufacturers are required to secure pre-market approval from the #CDSCO prior to the importation of medical devices and IVDs into India. Following a thorough review of the application, the CDSCO will then grant an import license. Here is a very good article going through the Indian regulatory process which I am sure you would like to #bookmark. It covers, ➠ 𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐜𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐨𝐛𝐭𝐚𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐞 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐂𝐃𝐒𝐂𝐎, 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐚 ➠ 𝐃𝐞𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐦𝐢𝐧𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐫𝐢𝐬𝐤 𝐜𝐥𝐚𝐬𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐦𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐨𝐫 𝐈𝐕𝐃𝐬 ➠ 𝐆𝐫𝐨𝐮𝐩𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐨𝐟 𝐦𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐥 𝐝𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐈𝐕𝐃𝐬 ➠ 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐢𝐧𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐚𝐧 𝐈𝐧𝐝𝐢𝐚𝐧 𝐀𝐮𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐫𝐢𝐳𝐞𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐯𝐞 ➠ 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐩𝐚𝐫𝐢𝐧𝐠 𝐒𝐮𝐛𝐦𝐢𝐬𝐬𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐃𝐨𝐜𝐮𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 ➠ 𝐂𝐃𝐒𝐂𝐎 𝐫𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐞𝐰 𝐨𝐟 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐢𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐞 𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 ➠ 𝐂𝐃𝐒𝐂𝐎 𝐚𝐩𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐚𝐥 ➠ 𝐂𝐃𝐒𝐂𝐎 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐫𝐠𝐞𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐋𝐢𝐜𝐞𝐧𝐬𝐞 𝐀𝐩𝐩𝐥𝐢𝐜𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 𝐑𝐞𝐯𝐢𝐞𝐰 If you have any questions or require assistance with the import of medical devices and IVDs in India, feel free to reach out to us at 8C Healthcare. Our experts are here to provide guidance, answer your queries, and help you with the intricacies of regulatory compliance. Contact us at contact@8chealthcare.com to get started on your journey to successfully bring your medical devices and IVDs to the Indian market. “𝒀𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒔𝒖𝒄𝒄𝒆𝒔𝒔 𝒊𝒔 𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝑭𝒖𝒕𝒖𝒓𝒆”. #8C #India #medical_device #regulations #IMDR2017

Advocating for fair pricing policies, Association of Indian Medical Device Industry (AIMED) urges for a separate regulatory framework tailored to the complexities of the medical devices sector. As the Department of Pharmaceuticals forms a committee to review pricing structures, industry leaders emphasize the need for equitable regulations that balance affordability and innovation. With parliamentary committees also recommending measures to support domestic manufacturing and enhance accessibility, the industry's call for reform reflects a commitment to ensuring sustainable healthcare solutions for all. Association of Indian Medical Device Industry (AIMED) Rajiv Nath Read more: https://lnkd.in/dbxJCwBx #MedicalDevices #HealthcareIndustry #RegulatoryFramework #PricingPolicies #HealthcareAccess

📢 ATTN: Manufacturers, Wholesalers, and Distributors It has come to the attention of the Medical Devices’ unit of SAHPRA that a few manufacturers, wholesalers, and distributors are still making use of the Medical Device Acknowledgement Letter in lieu of a medical device establishment licence. ❗ ❗ Please note the communication to industry that was published on 28 November 2019, Communication to Industry Licence Acknowledgement Letter, point 3 “POSITION TAKEN BY SAHPRA” in relation to the use of the Acknowledgement Letter in lieu of a medical device establishment licence. 👇 https://lnkd.in/dpayH_cw 📣📣📣 The use of an acknowledgement letter to sell and or distribute Medical Devices including IVDs is prohibited. #CommunicationtoIndustry #SAHPRA #MedicalDevices #IVDs #pharmaceuticalmanufacturers #pharmaceuticaldistributors #pharmaceuticalwholesalers #pharma

✅️ Diclofenac tab in Oman is not an OTC drug , so the answer in Viva Exam will be , not dispense, but, ✅️ I'll dispense for him diclofenac emugel instead to apply it at pain site... it means , systemic formulations of diclofenac " tabs , caps , IV ... etc" in Oman are POM , while the topical form is OTC ... 📌N.B: OTC = Over The Counter POM = Prescription Only Medicine ▪️Viva Exam Coaching ▪️ #Drug_Awareness
